lead_paragraph: -- Mr. CHARLES EAMES has resumed his connection with The Washington Union, position which he resigned some years ago, on being appointed by Mr. Polk Commissioner to the Sandwich Islands. Mr. Eamos concluded a favorable treaty with the Government of the Islands, and for a season edited The Pacific News, San Francisco. He returned, to New-York, and subsequently became for a short period editor of The Nashville Union.
